description:
Classic Russian Loto online and offline.

Features:
- awesome design
- 1-6 players game
- online game with lobby
- two game modes (classic and crazy loto)
- play with your friends from social networks
- variety of options for singleplayer game (time, difficulty, etc.)
- game hints (autoplace tokens, remove missed numbers, etc.)
- daily bonus
- crossplatform leaderboard

Lotto - is a classic. As a child, each of us had a period when we have learned to play bingo, loved it and kept it in our heart for a lifetime. Real bingo fans do not miss a single TV show of Russian Loto, Golden Horseshoe, Blitz games. Now you have the opportunity to play Russian bingo at any time, right on your mobile device. We promise to bring you authentic atmosphere with your favorite classic numbers nicknames "Hatchets", "Grandfather", "Drumsticks", and lots of fun.

Now it's time to download Loto and prove your mastery!
